title: "League of Legends has stopped working"
body:
So i've been trying to play league and every time I launch it works for maybe one game, afterwards it says it has stopped working. Any fixes?

Uninstalled and reinstalled already. Restarts don't work.


Using windows 7.

replies.body:

You could have an unstable connection, so it can crap out randomly if left unresolved.  Start off with the steps in the [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide to clear up this instability, and get you back in game.  Though your connection to the game server seems a bit erratic, I still recommend testing it in a custom just to be safe.  I hope that helps!
I tried the connection troubleshooting and restarted the client. It may be the most recent windows update but for some reason i cant even launch the login, same error message however.

Damn!  No worries, though, we can find more options for you.  Download the [hextech repair tool](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/224826367) to grab some logs, and hit us up in a [support ticket](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).  Our tech team can take a deeper look into your specific case and help figure this out.  Hang tight!
